it doesn't. maybe you just have good luck with kde. also, the ubuntu desktop by default loads the deskbar, and other items that take longer to load

no it's a little magnofying glass thing with the orange arrow

it can be disabled in System/Administration/Services

if you don't search through your files often you can disable it without any problems
also, if you don't have a printer, you can disable the CUPS printer service
also, if you don't have bluetooth stuff you can disable bluetooth services
those three services are safe to disable
